dictionary.ListError: An unexpected error occurred, when loading a page of the list.
dictionary.PermissionError: An unexpected error occurred when setting permission.
dictionary.DeleteRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when deleting the role.
dictionary.CreateRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when creating the role.
dictionary.RemoveUserFromRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when removing the user from the role.
dictionary.AddUserToRoleError: An unexpected error occurred when adding the user to the role.
